response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its value and the impact it can have on your projects, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it a highly attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
